name: Playwright Dev Container
postCreateCommand: curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_20.x | bash - && apt-get install -y nodejs && npm install -g allure && curl -sSL https://dot.net/v1/dotnet-install.sh | bash /dev/stdin --channel 10.0 --install-dir /usr/share/dotnet && dotnet build && cp .env.example .env
